title: How do I transmit a data file over Bluetooth?
answer:
l   Touch **File Manager**. Touch and hold the file you want to send and choose **Share** > **Bluetooth**.  


 l   Touch **Gallery**, select the file you want to send and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45349) > **Bluetooth**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45354) 


 l   On the music playing screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45355) > **Share** >** Share song** > **Bluetooth**. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45356) 

 l   Touch **Browser** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45357) > **Share page** > **Bluetooth**. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45359) 

 l   On the **Contacts** screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45360) > **Share contacts > Bluetooth**. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45362)
